name: 蔣政諺
objective:
本課程主要目的在於使用各種深度學習的方法，應用在微波遙測資料上面。主要以案例的方式介紹各種應用，因此除了會說明核心的演算法之外，也會介紹使用的訓練資料集的格式、前處理等內容。課程前段會先回顧基本的遙測影像特性以及深度學習技術，包含 CNNs, RNNs, GANs 和 YOLOs 等，常見於遙測資料應用的方法。課程中段會已實際的範例說明上述幾種方法的使用情境與成效。課程最後會要求學生以文獻研讀的方式說明不同深度學習方法在微波遙測上的實例。

The primary objective of this course is to apply various deep learning methods to microwave remote sensing data. It introduces diverse applications primarily through case studies, covering not only core algorithms but also the format of training datasets and preprocessing techniques. The initial part reviews fundamental remote sensing image characteristics and deep learning techniques, including CNNs, RNNs, GANs, and YOLOs—methods commonly applied to remote sensing data. The middle part demonstrates the practical scenarios and effectiveness of these approaches through real-world examples. The final part requires students to conduct literature reviews, presenting case studies of different deep learning methods applied to microwave remote sensing.
